itunes:title: #45 - The Golden Egg with David Heinemeier Hansson
title: #45 - The Golden Egg with David Heinemeier Hansson
description:
David Heinemeier Hansson - creator of Ruby on Rails, founder and CTO at Basecamp, and best selling author is joining us today on the Being Boss podcast to talk about finding the "golden egg" in your business and improving your odds to build something successful.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
content:encoded:
